description: This file provides service functions for managing products in an e-commerce platform, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting products from a database.

methods.name: listProducts({ category, q })
methods.description: Lists products with optional filters for category and search query.

methods.name: getProductById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a single product by its ID.

methods.name: createProduct({ name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl })
methods.description: Creates a new product record in the database.

methods.name: updateProduct(id, { name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl })
methods.description: Updates an existing product identified by its ID.

methods.name: deleteProduct(id)
methods.description: Deletes a product by its ID.

ctags.name: createProduct
ctags.pattern: /^async function createProduct({ name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl })

ctags.name: updateProduct
ctags.pattern: /^async function updateProduct(id, { name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl }) {$/
ctags.signature: (id, { name, description, price, stock, category, imageUrl })
